page.title: 14POPULATION IN CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: The population in Chelwood Gate is 700-800 people of all ages. Most of the people live in the Beaconsfield Road area. There are families who have lived in the area for generations, either on small holdings or tied cottages. There are manual workers, casual workers and people working in local shops, pubs and hotel, profes- sionals, industrialists, businessmen, office workers, servicemen and a few titled people and landowners. Some re- tired people remain in their own homes, others can go to the Beacon Old Peole's Home and some have to go to hospital or homes outside the village. There is a burial ground in Dane Hill which serves the two villages, or else cremation takes place outside the area.
